entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 03 January 2023
